sentence.Network_en: He remembered the stories told of his grandfather - of his strong views, unorthodoxy and scientific inclinations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他记得关于他祖父的许多故事 -- 他的激烈的见解, 非正统的言行和对科学的爱好.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unoriginal 非原创, unorthodoxy 异类, unorthodox 反正统

means.word_mean: 1. any opinions or doctrines at variance with the official or orthodox position
2. a belief that rejects the orthodox tenets of a religion

auth_sentence.content: So far so conventional, perhaps, but history tends to overlook the wilful unorthodoxy of early Keane.
auth_sentence.res_content: So far so conventional, perhaps, but history tends to overlook the wilful unorthodoxy of early Keane.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So far so conventional, perhaps, but history tends to overlook the wilful unorthodoxy of early Keane.
